TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供所有控制項的簡單實作，其中包含單一內容及標頭。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承屬性從，並定義類型的屬性。 inherits the property from and defines the property that is of type . 提供控制項的標題。 provides a heading for the control. 像是的屬性，則可以是任何類型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 下圖顯示兩個物件，繼承自。The following illustration shows two objects, which inherit from . 第一個已做為內容中的物件並:設為，其中包含和;設為 ，其中包含和。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二個設定為字串，而設為 single 。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 標頭屬性中的不同類型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property A有限制的預設樣式。A has a limited default style. 應用程式開發人員可以建立，但是其外觀會非常簡單。An application developer can create a , but its appearance will be very simple. 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新。If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . A適合用來建立自訂控制項，因為它提供單一的標頭的內容控制項的模型。A is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers. 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立< 備註 > 一節所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the Remarks section. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下列範例示範如何建立針對。The following examples show how to create a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像是的屬性，則可以是任何類型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 會使用相同的邏輯來顯示所述。The uses the same logic to display the that is described in . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立，其中包含兩個物件，繼承自。The following example creates a that contains two objects, which inherit from . 第一個已做為內容中的物件並:設為，其中包含和;設為 ，其中包含和。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二個設定為字串，而設為 single 。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下圖顯示先前範例所建立。The following illustration shows the created by the previous example. ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 標頭屬性中的不同類型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 下列範例會建立兩個物件，以指定的外觀並的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定在 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 複合字串，指定在 屬性顯示為字串的情況下，如何格式化這個屬性。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合或自訂的字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需有關字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或是屬性，則屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合`Student`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`類別具有`Name`屬性中，集合`Course`物件，並會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生的課程。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 此範例會使用將學生的名稱放入每個(繼承自)，而要顯示的內容中的每個學生的課程清單。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下列範例會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生的課程。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來顯示控制項標頭內容的樣板 (Template)。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 索引鍵，識別所要求的範本。The key that identifies the template being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 繫結參考使用，或也是可行的但不常見。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個物件，以指定的外觀並的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定提供自訂邏輯的資料範本選取器，以選擇要用來顯示標頭的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果兩個而設定屬性，則會忽略樣板選取器屬性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 類別衍生自實作實際覆寫。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 識別選取器實作所要求的索引鍵。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 索引鍵參考衍生類別實作實際覆寫。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 您可以也以程式設計方式新增的執行個體您類別作為資源字典中的資源。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
